DetailedStrategy: Investigate the technical specifications, user instructions and potential issues related to the Windows system, reinforcement learning, firewall, simulator software, and robot operations,

Plan.Purpose: To understand the setup process and compatibility issues within Windows version of Unity Python detailed for reinforcement learning and Robot simulation
To understand the implementation process of reinforcement learning in robotics within a Python/Unity integration
To understand the execution procedures of Robot simulation and reinforcement learning within Unity Python on MAC, for cross-reference purpose
To understand the robotic controls in a Unity/Python environment and any specific configurations related to the issue
To understand the Unity-Python integration in an another scenario (drone control) for cross-reference
